snippet: GORDON--Melvin. After a full life of 94 years, 70 with his beloved wife Natalie. They proudly created a family of three daughters, five granddaughters, four great- granddaughters, and one grandson. He had an immense capacity for friendship and deep interests in most everything. A natural teacher and writer professionally and personally. Generous with time and added value to the lives of others. We love him. Celebration of life plans: rgo9@aol.com or jgordon@uoregon.edu. 1/3
